With the help of pre-existing [[sand]], the user creates a [[wikipedia:sandstorm|sandstorm]] [[barrier]] that is capable of overpowering other active barriers, like the [[Sensing Barrier]]. The technique also disturbs [[Sensing Sand Sphere|sensing abilities]] of the opponents. The barrier can be used offensively to surround opponents and limit their sense of vision.
